traceability.evidence: The CLI parsing in bin/dry-aged-deps.js implements --min-age (with validation, default 7, and help text) but there is no code to read ‘minAge’ from a .dry-aged-deps.json config file. The help entry for --config-file still shows “(coming soon)”, and there are no tests or src modules that load or apply config-file values, nor any precedence logic for config-file > default.
traceability.notes: While CLI flag handling, defaults, validation, help text, and output messaging for thresholds are in place, the config-file support and CLI-overrides-config-file behavior required by this story are not implemented.
